item.title: Trixie (free track)
item.itunes:subtitle: Dragonica free track of the month! Go to dragonica.net for more.
item.itunes:summary: Hello Dragonicans, Its been a long time since I've posted a podcast. But I assure you it was worth the wait. I start by giving you a free track called Trixie. I hope you enjoy and visit our new facebook page at www.facebook.com/dragonica. See you on the flip side!Dragonica
item.description: Dragonica free track of the month! Go to dragonica.net for more.

item.itunes:subtitle: Ebon Stone presents
item.itunes:summary: This week's release of "Displace". This is another track that has a hardcore beat but smooth synths. Like always if you want to check new music go to http://dragonica.netsee you on the flip side.

item.title: Techno music by The Dragonica Project: Dance Techno Drum N Bass #7
item.itunes:subtitle: Ebon Stone Presents The Dragonica Project Dance Techno Drum n Bass #7
item.itunes:summary: Ebon Stone Presents The Dragonica Project Dance Techno Drum n Bass #7This week I am introducing a third brand new track called "Wiki#8". I hope you enjoy and I'll see you on the flip side.I want to also extend an invitation to http://dragonica.net and http://cdbaby.com/all/dragonica and listen to rest of my music.I also have included some links below to some of my friends that have made some music videos. Check them out and I hope you enjoy their music as well.Technohttp://one.revver.com/collections/show/167702Rockhttp://one.revver.com/collections/show/167703Hip Hophttp://one.revver.com/collections/show/167704R&Bhttp://one.revver.com/collections/show/167708Christianhttp://one.revver.com/collections/show/167725Soulhttp://one.revver.com/collections/show/167725Jazzhttp://one.revver.com/collections/show/167725

item.title: The Dragonica Project Podcast # 4
item.itunes:subtitle: The Dragonica Project Podcast # 4.
item.itunes:summary: The Dragonica Project Podcast # 4. I have 2 new track that I've made for the series from my current album Dance Techno Drum N Bass. If you enjoy listening to Chemical Brothers, Tiesto, Orbital, or The Crystal Method, then you will enjoy these tracks and also my previous tracks. Download the entire series and see for yourself. Link to http://dragonica.net/pod/feed.xml on your podcast reading software. Thanks for tuning in! Ebon Stonehttp://cdbaby.com/all/dragonica

item.title: The Dragonica Project Podcast # 3
item.itunes:subtitle: The Dragonica Project Podcast # 3
item.itunes:summary: Here you will find high energy Electronica tracks along the styles of The Crystal Method Prodigy, Chemical brothers and Tiesto with a dash of hip hop. Why don't you give it a turn?... you might even like it. Thanks for tuning in! The Dragonica Project (Est. 1999)http://cdbaby.com/all/dragonica
